id.description: Unique identifier for the contact attribute.

type.description: The type of contact attribute (e.g., text, number, boolean).

model.description: Model to which the contact attribute is associated.

name.description: The name of the contact attribute.

full_name.description: The full name associated with the contact attribute.

label.description: Label representing the attribute in user interfaces.

description.description: Description of the contact attribute for better understanding.

data_type.description: The data type of the contact attribute value.

options.description: List of available options for the attribute.

api_writable.description: Indicates whether the attribute is writable via API.

ui_writable.description: Indicates whether the attribute is writable via user interface.

custom.description: Indicates if the attribute is a custom user-defined field.

archived.description: Flag to signify if the contact attribute is archived.

admin_id.description: Unique identifier for the admin associated with the contact attribute.

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the contact attribute was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of when the contact attribute was last updated.

messenger_writable.description: Indicates whether the attribute is writable via messenger.
